item.title: Mermaid Support Flowchart
item.description: This theme now supports the use of Mermaid to draw flowcharts, sequence diagrams, Gantt charts, state diagrams, relationship diagrams, and more in plain text format. With the gradual development of Mermaid, various types of diagrams will be introduced in the future. For more types and usage methods, please follow its official website: https://mermaid-js.github.io/ .
